page.title: 02THE ST. MARGARETS AREA
page.content: St.Margarets is part of Twickenham and is close to London. It has a very friendly atmosphere,almost like a village.There is a good train service to Waterloo in one direction and Kingston in the other.There are several grassy areas,like Moormead and Marble Hill Park.There is a small shopping area including a variety of junk shops!The Twickenham Film Studios are near the centre of St.Margarets. There are some good pubs and restaurants to visit.There are many activities locally that you can take part in including skating at the icerink in Richmond,boating and sailing on the{Thames,}fishing or feeding the ducks, swimming at the local pool or shooting down the{water} {slide} or walking in the park.There are several good schools, especially { {St.Stephens!}It is a nice place to be!
